methodology.title: Our Training Methodology
methodology.subtitle: A systematic approach to athletic development

steps.title: Assessment
steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation of movement patterns, strength, speed, and sport-specific skills to establish baseline metrics.

steps.title: Program Design
steps.description: Customized training plan based on assessment results, individual goals, and sport-specific requirements.

steps.title: Progressive Training
steps.description: Structured progression through training phases, building foundational strength, power, and sport-specific skills.

steps.title: Performance Testing
steps.description: Regular performance testing to track progress, identify areas for improvement, and adjust programming.

steps.title: Refinement & Optimization
steps.description: Continuous program refinement based on performance data and athlete feedback to maximize results.

safety.title: Safety & Protocols
safety.subtitle: Your safety is our top priority

items.title: Certified Coaching Staff

items.title: First Aid & Emergency Response

items.title: Equipment Maintenance
items.description: Regular inspection and maintenance of all training equipment to ensure safety and optimal performance.

items.title: Proper Supervision
items.description: Appropriate coach-to-athlete ratios maintained at all times to ensure proper technique and safety.
